author: Susheel Kona
comment: Exactly what I was looking for! However there are many bugs, especially with the layout.
title: Very Functional

author: Shuhrat Ahmed
comment: Really useful. I love the calendar feature.  Would be cooler if it had a tasks widget as well. And a feature that lets you select a lesson from your timetable to select a due date as you create a new task.
title: Awesome

author: John Telford
comment: I would love this app if it supported StudentVue, you should look into it!
title: NEEDS STUDENTVUE SUPPORT.

author: Niels Koomans
comment: I have connected this app to the Untis webservice of my school yet it won't synchronize with my system. Can you look into this please?
title: Untis connected, won't sync

author: Collin Livingstone
comment: Definitely on the right track to being a 5 star worthy app.
title: Lots of potential

author: Dipo Olaosun
comment: Should be able to sync to all platfoms

author: Nika S.
comment: It really helps me during my school day!

author: Наталья Торопыгина
comment: Need to support connected between phone and tablet.
title: Good

author: Paul Thorwirth
comment: awesome job man. just a few things for even more awesomeness: add an option to change the bg color (and along with that the text color for white text on dark grey/black) and add an option to get a day view in the timetable screen like the official app has. enable more lookahead in timetable screen (atm 26 august i can only scroll right til 26 sep). also it needs annonymous login option. for my school w/ user/pass no teacher is displayed (also in official app) -.-

reply.author: Julian Wagner
reply.content:
Hi Paul,
thanks for your feedback. The anonymous login is not supported by WebUntis to third party apps. The fact that you can only load your timetable one week ahead and teachers aren't being displayed is a setting made by your school. Sry theres nothing I can do about that. :( 
I will consider the other features for future versions. :)

title: way better than official untis app

author: Nate Gantt
comment: Needs a widget; then it will be perfect.

author: Nancy Chi
comment: wow, oha, ich habe noch nie so etwas tolles gesehen, wie krass wow! 💪
title: super 🌝

author: Dat Ha
comment: The functionality in the app right now is great, but for schools who do rotating schedules and letter schedules, it doesn't work.

reply.author: Julian Wagner
reply.content:
Hey Dat Ha, 
thanks for your feedback. I'll look into adding rotating schedules to the app. I'm not sure what you mean by letter schedules, it would be great if you could email me to explain the term. 
Kind regards 
Julian Wagner

title: Rotating Schedule

author: Charlie Ashfield
comment: Putting my timetable in, reached Thursday and put in a class that was early compared to previous entries and it deleted everything from before 2pm on all the other days.

reply.author: Julian Wagner
reply.content:
Hi Charlie, 
sry for the troubles. You might have created a new school term, which means all your data is still there. Simply change back to your old term inside the profile.

title: Instant uninstall
